title.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.

description.narrative: Objectives for Afghanistan: OBJECTIVES: To improve reading skills of students in grades one to three and introduce adults to reading and writing. To develop the organizational capacity of Afghan education institutions with the aim of enhancing governance, diversifying funding streams, and reducing dependency. To strengthen the education system to prepare Afghan youth for employment. To provide scholarships to selected young Afghan women to complete undergraduate and post-graduate programs.
USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
